TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EncryptedData extends System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedType
Public NotInheritable Class EncryptedData Inherits EncryptedType

Docs.summary: Represents the element in XML encryption. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is used to represent the `<EncryptedData>` element in XML encryption. This element is the core element in XML encryption. Its child element, `<CipherData>`, contains encrypted data. The `<EncryptedData>` element replaces an encrypted element or serves as the new document root.
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class. This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.
[!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/cs/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.EncryptedData/vb/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor creates a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class. For more information about XML encryption standards, see [XML Encryption Syntax and Processing](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/).
## Examples The following example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class. This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use this method to load an existing XML element into the `<EncryptedData>` element represented by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> object.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt and decrypt an XML element by using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class. This example then displays various properties of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> class to the console.
